title: Remove Account
init: $('body').addClass('textured');$('#subheader').text(OF.page.title);$('#submit').touch(function(){var button=$(this);if(!button.isLoading()){button.isLoading(true);OF.api.request('/xp/devices/'+OF.device.identifier+"/users/"+OF.user.id,{method:'DELETE',loader:'#submit',success:function(){alert("Your account has been successfully removed from this device.");OF.sendAction('logout');},complete:function(){button.isLoading(false);}});}});
html:
Settings

You are about to remove your account from this device and log out of Feint.

Remove Account
